name: Lawmakers of the West
description:
Created for Gay Western Jam

Sound Warning

I basically thought about the jerk-off motion input method and then tried to make something around that.

I thought about making the gun penis shaped but I thought that would be trite.

If there were more hours in the day this would be a more complete parody of Accolade's Law of the West

Also on Github if you're into that kind of thing.
